targets.query: SELECT last("float") FROM "rivian" WHERE ("sensor" = 'energy_storage/SOC/SOC_user') GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT last("str") FROM "rivian" WHERE ("sensor" = 'energy_storage/charger/vehicle_charger_state') GROUP BY time(1s) fill(previous)
SELECT last("str") FROM "rivian" WHERE ("sensor" = 'dynamics/modes/drive_mode_air_suspension') GROUP BY time(1s) fill(previous)
SELECT last("str") FROM "rivian" WHERE ("sensor" = 'dynamics/modes/drive_mode_damping') GROUP BY time(1s) fill(previous)
SELECT (last("int") * 9/5) +32 FROM "rivian" WHERE ("sensor" = 'thermal/hvac_cabin_control/cabin_temperature') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) fill(previous)
SELECT last("int") FROM "rivian" WHERE ("sensor" = 'dynamics/speed_performance/mass_estimate') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) fill(previous)
